name: Kelvin Davies
description: My name is Kelvin Davies from Miami-Florida in the US.I am 56 years of age, 5’8″ inches Tall,175 lbs and muscular build, Black hair and a little gray and blue eyes.I have a kid who is 20 years of age.I am a really fun person who loves people,loves to laugh, I am very caring,love music, dancing, singing and Love the church..I’m a very caring and considerate person and I’m looking for the same.I’m a great believer in conversation and while i like to talk,I’m also a good listener.I value friendship very highly.Good friends can be hard to find.So in my search for a new partner,I like to build a strong base of trust and care before anything else.The best friend one could have who is unconditionally by your side, whom you can trust completely to always be with you, even when you disagree on any matter. It is someone you miss spiritually and physically when you are apart. In essence it is someone you can share everything with – good and bad…I had made up my mind to stay single until i die after the death of my wife i realized one thing also, as staying single is not such a fun thing to do because i always feel lonely and i wish i had that company of a very loving and affectionate woman.If you want to know more about me,lets get in touch.
